Question.Subject: Is AVG Anti-virus a legit anti-virus program?
Question.Content: A computer at our office was running AVG Anti-virus program and it seemed to be scanning every e-mail that came in and it was making me nervous so I uninstalled it and deleted any leftover files there were. I don't mind having it if it is legit but all I can find on google is ads for the program?!?
Question.ChosenAnswer: antivirus tips and antivirus download: http://merakit-komputer.com http://merakit-komputer.com

Answer.Content: AVG is very legit. Although nowhere close to being the best out. Malwarebytes is the best handsdown and its free. wwww.malwarebytes.com
Yes, it's a legit program. I've been running it for years! Works very well.
AVG is a legit program and it works good, but its not the best out there.
it's legit. but not very good.

I recommend using Super Anti-Spyware. Its an official government program. The trial can be downloaded for free at http://www.superantispyware.com/ and the trial never expires The trial is almost identical to the full program. It acts as an all in one anti virus and is 100% safe
Answer.Reference: Personal use of the program and a few years of computer experience
